coreAttributes.authorTag: Underneath the scope rails, there is a small engraving that reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: pepper grenade launcher
coreAttributes.description: Originally designed to disperse pepper oil more efficiently via airburst, it was soon found that the residual heat from the bursting charge turned the aerosolized oil into a small explosive cloud. Despite being a serious design flaw, the Enforcers asked that it not be fixed.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Shoot [npc2.name] with your pepper grenade launcher.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the grenade launcher, [npc.verb(slap)] in a fresh magazine, [npc.verb(pull)] the charging handle, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety off.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the magazine, and [npc.verb(turn)] the safety on, [npc.verb(pull)] the charging handle, and [npc.verb(put)] the grenade launcher away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The grenade disperses a fine orange mist near [npc2.name] before engulfing [npc2.her] aura in a fiery cloud. #IF game.isSillyModeEnabled() #THEN [npc.speech(That's a spicy meatball!)] [npc.name] [npc.verb(shout)]. #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The shot goes wide! The grenade explodes well away from [npc2.name].
